mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.hdfs

Class HdfsCommandLineOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.ingest.hdfs.HdfsCommandLineOptions

  • public class HdfsCommandLineOptions
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the command-line options and parsed values specific to staging intermediate data to HDFS.
